nodes.text: "The Courage of Palpatine" was a feature exhibit in the Hanna Institute of Antiquities—a museum and university located in Hanna City, the capital of the Core World of Chandrila—during the Galactic Civil War. The exhibit focused on the bravery then-Supreme Chancellor Palpatine had shown during the Clone Wars. It was the least-visited exhibit in the history of the institute.
"The Courage of Palpatine" was mentioned in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games.
